announcement.goals.kinswathe.cook: See players that eat through walls!
tip.kinswathe.drugmaker.poison_failed: It seems to be immune to poisoning...
announcement.goals.kinswathe.hunter: Enjoy your prey to the fullest!
announcement.goals.kinswathe.kidnapper: Kidnap passenger to a concealed corner.
tip.kinswathe.kidnapper.daze_failed: It seems to be immune to dazing...
announcement.goals.kinswathe.licensed_vi: You might still retain a shred of conscience...
game.win.kinswathe.licensed_villain: The licensed villain ended everyone's life!
announcement.goals.kinswathe.physician: See poisoned players through walls and treat them.
announcement.goals.kinswathe.robot: A machine devoid of any emotion.
item.kinswathe.blowgun.tooltip:
Point, right-click and shoot
Target that be shooted will be poisoned
1 minute cooldown
item.kinswathe.hunting_knife.tooltip:
Right-click, hold for a second and get close to your victim
If stop holding, four times holding-time cooldown
After a kill, cannot be used for 45 seconds
Attack to knock back / push a player (no cooldown)
item.kinswathe.knockout_drug.tooltip:
Use on a player to daze it for 20 seconds
The affected player will follow you
Use sneaking key to release it
Single use, 1 minute cooldown
item.kinswathe.medical_kit.tooltip:
Use on a player to remove poison
1 minute cooldown
item.kinswathe.pan.tooltip:
Right-click, hold for a second and stun target for 5 seconds
45 seconds cooldown
item.kinswathe.pill.tooltip:
Right-click to eat
Protects player one extra hit of life
Single use, 2 minute cooldown
item.kinswathe.poison_injector.tooltip:
Use on a player to poison it
If target have been poisoned, directly cause death
1 minute cooldown
item.kinswathe.sulfuric_acid_barrel.tool:
Use on a dead body to dissolve it
1 minute cooldown
